DOC.brief_summary: Study Cohort : All Children ( Age : 3 months- 18 year , correct age upto 2 year preterm child ) Chronic Liver Disease attend Pediatric Hepatology Out Patient Department/In Patient Department
DOC.brief_title: Nutritional Assessment Tool Childhood Chronic Liver Disease
DOC.criteria: 1 . Children age 3 month 18 year ( correct age upto 2 year preterm child ) 2 . Chronic liver disease . 1 . Any metabolic endocrinal disease independently affect nutritional status 2 . Refusal give write informed consent participate study
